class.name: HarmonicFitterTest

method.name: testTinyVariationsData
method.comment: This test serves to cover the part of the code of "guessAOmega"
when the algorithm using integrals fails.

method.name: testUnsorted
method.comment: build a regularly spaced array of measurements

method.name: testMath844
method.comment: The guesser fails because the function is far from an harmonic
function: It is a triangular periodic function with amplitude 3
and period 12, and all sample points are taken at integer abscissae
so function values all belong to the integer subset {-3, -2, -1, 0,
